message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements provided:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Taxes Payable" with an end amount of 43,168.61 as of 2024-02-01.

2. In the income statement, I see "Tax Expense" listed as 43,168.61 for the period ending 2024-02-01.

3. In the cash flow statement, I see "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" as 43,168.61.

The "Tax Expense" line in the income statement specifically represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period. This is the value I need to extract.

Therefore, the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay is 43,168.61.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '43168.61'} }
```
